People should check with a health care provider before using these products because some groups, such as young children and pregnant and breastfeeding women, may not be able to use them.",NIDDK,Lactose Intolerance
What to do for Lactose Intolerance ?,"- Lactose is a sugar found in milk and milk products.  - Lactose intolerance i
